entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to flurries this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
